data.name: SettingManagedByEnvironment
data.value: This setting is managed via environment variable

data.name: SettingConfiguredViaEnvironment
data.value: This setting is configured via environment variable {0} and cannot be modified through the UI.

data.name: EnterCredentials
data.value: Enter your credentials to access Squirrel Wiki

data.name: AdministratorAccessDescription
data.value: Full system access including configuration and user management

data.name: EditorAccessDescription
data.value: Can create, edit, and manage wiki pages

data.name: ProfileManagedByProvider
data.value: Profile information is managed by your authentication provider

data.name: ModernStackDescription
data.value: Built on .NET 10.0 with ASP.NET Core, Entity Framework Core, and Bootstrap 5.

data.name: MarkdownSupportDescription
data.value: CommonMark-compliant Markdown with extensions powered by Markdig.

data.name: ContainerReadyDescription
data.value: Docker and Kubernetes support for easy deployment and scaling.

data.name: CheckGitHubRepository
data.value: Check the GitHub repository for the latest updates and documentation.

data.name: UseSpecificKeywords
data.value: Use specific keywords for better results

data.name: MultipleWordsSearch
data.value: Multiple words will search for pages containing all words

data.name: DeletePageConfirmation
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete the page

data.name: NoTagsFound
data.value: No tags found in the wiki.

data.name: TagsCreatedWhenAdded
data.value: Tags are created when you add them to pages.

data.name: AndAddSomeTags
data.value: and add some tags to get started.

data.name: EnterPageContentMarkdown
data.value: Enter page content in Markdown format...

data.name: OrganizePageIntoCategory
data.value: Organize your page into a category

data.name: LockedPagesEditableByAdmins
data.value: Locked pages can only be edited by administrators

data.name: NoVersionHistoryAvailable
data.value: No version history available for this page.

data.name: AreYouSureRevertToVersion
data.value: Are you sure you want to revert to version

data.name: RevertWillCreateNewVersion
data.value: This will create a new version with the content from the selected version.

data.name: NoPagesFoundWithTag
data.value: No pages found with the tag

data.name: NoPagesFoundInCategory
data.value: No pages found in the category

data.name: ExplorePagesOrganizedByCategory
data.value: Explore pages organized by category hierarchy

data.name: NoCategoriesCreatedYet
data.value: No categories have been created yet.

data.name: OrganizeWikiPagesWithCategories
data.value: Organize your wiki pages with hierarchical categories

data.name: CreateFirstCategoryToOrganize
data.value: to start organizing your wiki pages.

data.name: CategoriesHelpOrganize
data.value: Categories help organize your wiki content into a hierarchical structure.

data.name: CreateNestedCategories
data.value: Create nested categories up to any depth

data.name: AssignPagesToCategories
data.value: Assign pages to categories for better navigation

data.name: AutomaticBreadcrumbs
data.value: Automatic breadcrumbs based on category path

data.name: KeepHierarchyReasonable
data.value: Keep hierarchy depth reasonable (3-4 levels max)

data.name: ClickCreateRootCategory
data.value: Click "Create Root Category" to create a top-level category. You can then add subcategories by clicking the "Add Subcategory" button on any category.

data.name: AreYouSureDeleteCategory
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete the category

data.name: CategoryHasSubcategories
data.value: This category has {0} subcategory(ies). Please delete or move them first.

data.name: CategoryContainsPages
data.value: This category contains {0} page(s). Please remove or recategorize them first.

data.name: UseLettersNumbersSpaces
data.value: Use letters, numbers, spaces, hyphens, and underscores only.

data.name: SelectParentToCreateSubcategory
data.value: Select a parent category to create a subcategory, or choose "(None - Root Level)" for a top-level category.

data.name: ChangingParentWillMoveCategory
data.value: Changing the parent category will move this category and all its subcategories to a new location in the hierarchy.

data.name: WarningWillUpdatePageURLs
data.value: This will update all page URLs under this category.

data.name: CategoryNameValidCharactersOnly
data.value: Category name can only contain letters, numbers, spaces, hyphens, and underscores.

data.name: TotalPagesIncludesSubcategories
data.value: Total pages includes pages in all subcategories.

data.name: CustomizeNavigationBars
data.value: Customize navigation bars, sidebars, and footer zones

data.name: MenuMarkupDescription
data.value: MenuMarkup is a simple, markdown-like syntax for creating navigation menus.

data.name: SupportForTokens
data.value: Support for tokens, page slugs, tags, and categories

data.name: ClickCreateNewMenu
data.value: Click "Create New Menu" to build your first navigation menu. The editor includes a live preview and syntax guide.

data.name: AreYouSureDeleteMenu
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete the menu

data.name: CreateNewMenuDescription
data.value: Create a new navigation menu using MenuMarkup syntax

data.name: DescriptiveNameForMenu
data.value: A descriptive name for this menu

data.name: MenuTypeDescription
data.value: The type determines where and how this menu is used. Only one menu of each type can be active at a time.

data.name: ActiveMenuDescription
data.value: When active, this menu will be displayed on the site. Activating this menu will deactivate any other menu of the same type.

data.name: UseMenuMarkupSyntax
data.value: Use MenuMarkup syntax to define menu items (see syntax guide below)

data.name: ContentForLeftFooterZone
data.value: Content for the left footer zone. Use [[Text|URL]] for links.

data.name: ContentForRightFooterZone
data.value: Content for the right footer zone. Use [[Text|URL]] for links.

data.name: ClickPreviewToSee
data.value: Click "Preview" to see how your menu will render

data.name: DropdownsNeedNoURL
data.value: Dropdowns need no URL in header

data.name: EnterMenuMarkupToPreview
data.value: Enter some menu markup to preview

data.name: PageNotFoundMessage
data.value: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

data.name: ServerErrorMessage
data.value: Something went wrong on our end. We're working to fix it.

data.name: TryAgainLater
data.value: Please try again later or contact support if the problem persists.

data.name: AccessDeniedMessage
data.value: You don't have permission to access this resource.

data.name: AccessDeniedHelp
data.value: If you believe you should have access, please contact your administrator.

data.name: PageRequiresSpecificPermissions
data.value: This page requires specific permissions that your account doesn't have.

data.name: YouAreCurrentlyLoggedInAs
data.value: You are currently logged in as

data.name: YouNeedToSignIn
data.value: You need to sign in to access this resource.

data.name: IfYouBelieveYouShouldHaveAccess
data.value: If you believe you should have access to this resource, please contact your administrator.

data.name: DistributedCacheSettings
data.value: Distributed caching configuration for categories, tags, pages, and other data

data.name: CacheEnabledDescription
data.value: Enable or disable distributed caching globally. Changes take effect immediately.

data.name: CacheExpirationMinutesDescription
data.value: Default expiration time in minutes for cached items. Changes take effect immediately.

data.name: CacheProviderDescription
data.value: Cache provider to use (Memory or Redis). ⚠️ Requires application restart to take effect. Configure via environment variables for production.

data.name: RedisConfigurationDescription
data.value: Redis server connection string (e.g., localhost:6379). Only used when Cache Provider is Redis. ⚠️ Requires application restart to take effect.

data.name: RedisInstanceNameDescription
data.value: Prefix for Redis cache keys to avoid conflicts with other applications. ⚠️ Requires application restart to take effect.

data.name: SiteURLDescription
data.value: The base URL of your wiki

data.name: AllowAnonymousReadingDescription
data.value: Allow non-authenticated users to read pages

data.name: MaxLoginAttemptsDescription
data.value: Maximum number of failed login attempts before account is locked

data.name: AccountLockDurationMinutesDescription
data.value: Duration in minutes that an account remains locked after exceeding maximum login attempts

data.name: SearchResultsPerPageDescription
data.value: Number of search results per page

data.name: ErrorLoadingSettings
data.value: Error loading settings. Please try again.

data.name: ErrorLoadingSetting
data.value: Error loading setting. Please try again.

data.name: YouCanLoginWithUsernameOrEmail
data.value: You can login with either username or email:

data.name: AreYouSureDeleteUser
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete the user

data.name: KeepTheirDataForAudit
data.value: Keep their data for audit purposes

data.name: NoUsersFoundMatchingCriteria
data.value: No users found matching your criteria.

data.name: TooManyFailedAttempts
data.value: Too many failed login attempts. Account locked.

data.name: UseUniquePassword
data.value: Use a unique password that you don't use elsewhere

data.name: NeverSharePassword
data.value: Never share your password with anyone

data.name: UsernameCannotBeChanged
data.value: Username cannot be changed after creation.

data.name: PasswordMustMeetRequirements
data.value: Password must be at least 8 characters and contain uppercase, lowercase, digit, and special character.

data.name: AdminRoleDescription
data.value: Full access to all features including user management and system settings.

data.name: EditorRoleDescription
data.value: Can create, edit, and delete wiki pages.

data.name: CreatingAUserDescription
data.value: Fill in the required fields to create a new local user account. The user will be able to log in using the username and password you provide.

data.name: AdminRoleFullDescription
data.value: Has full access to all features including user management, system settings, and all wiki operations.

data.name: EditorRoleFullDescription
data.value: Can create, edit, and delete wiki pages but cannot access administrative features.

data.name: CanEditUserDetailsLater
data.value: You can edit user details and change passwords later from the user details page.

data.name: LeaveBlankToKeepCurrentPassword
data.value: Leave blank to keep current password.

data.name: EditingAUserDescription
data.value: Update user information, roles, and account status. Changes take effect immediately.

data.name: PasswordChangeDescription
data.value: Leave password fields blank to keep the current password. If you enter a new password, it must meet all password requirements.

data.name: UserAuthenticatesViaProvider
data.value: This user authenticates via {0}. Password cannot be changed here.

data.name: BeCarefulModifyingAdminRoles
data.value: Be careful when modifying admin roles. Ensure at least one admin account remains active.

data.name: AreYouSureDeactivateUser
data.value: Are you sure you want to deactivate the user

data.name: RevokeAccessToSystem
data.value: Revoke their access to the system

data.name: KeepDataIntact
data.value: Keep their data intact (can be reactivated later)

data.name: ResetPasswordInfo
data.value: You are resetting the password for user {0}. The user will be able to log in with the new password immediately.

data.name: InformUserOfPasswordChange
